content: will have to skip one stitch in-between each group of 3 double_crochet rather than two it doesn t matter where you do this and it won t be noticed round 9-15 chain 3 2 double_crochet in same space work 3 double_crochet in each space created by the clusters in the previous row slip_stitch in 3rd chain to join round feel free to change colors as you like i did the base and most of the side row in my main color but did row 9 12 and 15 in my second color round 16-19 chain 1 counts as single_crochet single_crochet in each stitch slip_stitch in ch1 to join round finish off weave in ends here are some photos of the process with more explanations here is the first round complete pull the short end to close the center hole if using a magic_ring i chose to leave the hole just a little bit open rather that shut tight it should look like this and be around 4 inches it will be just a little smaller than 4 inches in diameter once round 7 is complete this is the circle base because we re using half double crochets it might not lay flat don t worry about that because this is a hat it is perfectly fine if the middle rises www etsy com/shop/quietkoala www facebook com/thequietkoala here you can see the shape starting to form after round 8 also notice the spaces that are present between each group of double crochets for rounds 9-15 groups of 3dc are worked into these spaces up to round 15 complete starting round 16 here you can see where i chose to change colors you can also see how each group of 3dc is worked into the space between two groups in the previous round here s just a reference to see how big your hat should be at this point around 4 ½ inches is a great place for it to be at this round it should be almost 5 inches tall when you are done now all i have to do is weave in my ends most of which are hidden inside feel free to add decoration such as flowers bows or pom-poms to your hat this is especially cute for girl s hats the first hat i made was in pink so i added a flower i won t to this one so it can be for a cute little boy www etsy com/shop/quietkoala www facebook com/thequietkoala
